body:
Vulnerable Library - temporal-client-0.1.0

Path to dependency file: /packages/core-bridge/Cargo.toml

Path to vulnerable library: /packages/core-bridge/Cargo.toml

Found in HEAD commit: fde5f6b46128523f394c660def334e7717f94ac7

## Vulnerabilities | CVE | Severity | CVSS | Dependency | Type | Fixed in (temporal-client version) | Remediation Possible** | | ------------- | ------------- | ----- | ----- | ----- | ------------- | --- | | [WS-2023-0305](https://github.com/rustls/webpki/commit/4ea052366f342a06344aab589565179b59b342d3) | High | 7.5 | rustls-webpki-0.100.1.crate | Transitive | N/A* | ❌ | | [CVE-2018-16875](https://www.mend.io/vulnerability-database/CVE-2018-16875) | High | 7.5 | rustls-webpki-0.100.1.crate | Transitive | N/A* | ❌ | | [WS-2023-0366](https://github.com/bytecodealliance/rustix/commit/31fd98ca723b93cc6101a3e29843ea5cf094e159) | Medium | 5.5 | rustix-0.37.20.crate | Transitive | N/A* | ❌ |

*For some transitive vulnerabilities, there is no version of direct dependency with a fix. Check the "Details" section below to see if there is a version of transitive dependency where vulnerability is fixed.

**In some cases, Remediation PR cannot be created automatically for a vulnerability despite the availability of remediation

## Details
WS-2023-0305 ### Vulnerable Library - rustls-webpki-0.100.1.crate

Web PKI X.509 Certificate Verification.

Library home page: https://crates.io/api/v1/crates/rustls-webpki/0.100.1/download

Path to dependency file: /packages/core-bridge/Cargo.toml

Path to vulnerable library: /packages/core-bridge/Cargo.toml

Dependency Hierarchy: - temporal-client-0.1.0 (Root Library) - temporal-sdk-core-protos-0.1.0 - tonic-0.9.2.crate - tokio-rustls-0.24.1.crate - rustls-0.21.2.crate - :x: **rustls-webpki-0.100.1.crate** (Vulnerable Library)

Found in HEAD commit: fde5f6b46128523f394c660def334e7717f94ac7

Found in base branch: main

### Vulnerability Details

rustls-webpki: CPU denial of service in certificate path building

Publish Date: 2023-08-22

URL: WS-2023-0305

### CVSS 3 Score Details (7.5)

Base Score Metrics: - Exploitability Metrics: - Attack Vector: Network - Attack Complexity: Low - Privileges Required: None - User Interaction: None - Scope: Unchanged - Impact Metrics: - Confidentiality Impact: None - Integrity Impact: None - Availability Impact: High

For more information on CVSS3 Scores, click here.

### Suggested Fix

Type: Upgrade version

Origin: https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-fh2r-99q2-6mmg

Release Date: 2023-08-22

Fix Resolution: rustls-webpki - 0.100.2,0.101.4

CVE-2018-16875 ### Vulnerable Library - rustls-webpki-0.100.1.crate

Web PKI X.509 Certificate Verification.

Library home page: https://crates.io/api/v1/crates/rustls-webpki/0.100.1/download

Path to dependency file: /packages/core-bridge/Cargo.toml

Path to vulnerable library: /packages/core-bridge/Cargo.toml

Dependency Hierarchy: - temporal-client-0.1.0 (Root Library) - temporal-sdk-core-protos-0.1.0 - tonic-0.9.2.crate - tokio-rustls-0.24.1.crate - rustls-0.21.2.crate - :x: **rustls-webpki-0.100.1.crate** (Vulnerable Library)

Found in HEAD commit: fde5f6b46128523f394c660def334e7717f94ac7

Found in base branch: main

### Vulnerability Details

The crypto/x509 package of Go before 1.10.6 and 1.11.x before 1.11.3 does not limit the amount of work performed for each chain verification, which might allow attackers to craft pathological inputs leading to a CPU denial of service. Go TLS servers accepting client certificates and TLS clients are affected.

Publish Date: 2018-12-14

URL: CVE-2018-16875

### CVSS 3 Score Details (7.5)

Base Score Metrics: - Exploitability Metrics: - Attack Vector: Network - Attack Complexity: Low - Privileges Required: None - User Interaction: None - Scope: Unchanged - Impact Metrics: - Confidentiality Impact: None - Integrity Impact: None - Availability Impact: High

For more information on CVSS3 Scores, click here.

### Suggested Fix

Type: Upgrade version

Origin: https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-fh2r-99q2-6mmg

Release Date: 2018-12-14

Fix Resolution: golang 1.10.6,golang 1.11.3, webpki - 0.22.2, rustls-webpki - 0.100.2,0.101.4

WS-2023-0366 ### Vulnerable Library - rustix-0.37.20.crate

Safe Rust bindings to POSIX/Unix/Linux/Winsock2-like syscalls

Library home page: https://crates.io/api/v1/crates/rustix/0.37.20/download

Path to dependency file: /packages/core-bridge/Cargo.toml

Path to vulnerable library: /packages/core-bridge/Cargo.toml

Dependency Hierarchy: - temporal-client-0.1.0 (Root Library) - temporal-sdk-core-protos-0.1.0 - prost-wkt-types-0.4.2.crate - prost-build-0.11.9.crate - tempfile-3.6.0.crate - :x: **rustix-0.37.20.crate** (Vulnerable Library)

Found in HEAD commit: fde5f6b46128523f394c660def334e7717f94ac7

Found in base branch: main

### Vulnerability Details

rustix's `rustix::fs::Dir` iterator with the `linux_raw` backend can cause memory explosion

Publish Date: 2023-10-18

URL: WS-2023-0366

### CVSS 3 Score Details (5.5)

Base Score Metrics: - Exploitability Metrics: - Attack Vector: Local - Attack Complexity: Low - Privileges Required: None - User Interaction: Required - Scope: Unchanged - Impact Metrics: - Confidentiality Impact: None - Integrity Impact: None - Availability Impact: High

For more information on CVSS3 Scores, click here.

### Suggested Fix

Type: Upgrade version

Origin: https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c827-hfw6-qwvm

Release Date: 2023-10-18

Fix Resolution: rustix - 0.35.15,0.36.16,0.37.25,0.38.19
